text: Zoltán Halász (23 June 1960 – 9 August 2022) was a Hungarian cyclist. He competed at the 1980 Summer Olympics. Halász died on 9 August 2022 in Szekszárd, Hungary at the age of 62.Zoltán Halász == References == Category:1960 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Hungarian cyclists Category:Olympians for Hungary
title: Zoltán Halász
